scripts.build-copy: webpack --mode production && cp  dist/style.css dist/bundle.js dist/index.html  ../../../flexatar-sdk/chrome-extension/dist/progress/

scripts.build-copy-main-page: webpack --mode production && cp  dist/bundle.js dist/index.html dist/style.css  ../../../flexatar-sdk/main-page/dist/progress/
